# astra Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
variable "token" {}

provider "astra" {
  // This can also be set via ASTRA_API_TOKEN environment variable.
  token = var.token
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- **token** (String) Authentication token for Astra API.
